description:
A free, powerful and flexible map plugin based on Leaflet.

Also, check my plugin making course: https://www.unlimitedbubbling.dev/plugin_makery
With it you will have everything you need to create new plugins, in other words, you will create new features in Bubble yourself! 
No more limits for you.

See https://forum.bubble.is/t/leafy-maps-new-free-plugin/63757 for instructions.
And use the search tool in that topic, there is a lot of information scattered in several posts.
